name: Romanians vs Ottomans
description:
You press R to skip the turn. You select the flags and then use the arrow keys or wasd to move

The Romanian flag should have been the flag of Dacia, but it was too hard to draw and the Ottoman flag looks white because the flag of the time that is happening is yellow and white and the compression removes a yellow line and it becomes just a yellow semicircle.

This game was made for the Romanian Game Jam - Great Union Day
